scenario_name: Recently Inactive: Zero Activity for 95 Days (Medium Confidence)
description: User with SCM license who has not logged in for 95 days. Meets the 90-day threshold but under 180 days, so MEDIUM confidence. Still a suspension candidate.

expected_recommendation.rationale: User has zero activity in the last 95 days. Below 180-day HIGH confidence threshold, but exceeds 90-day inactivity threshold. Recommend suspension with review.
